name: Dark Union
description:
DATT4300

Project 1

Game Name: Dark Union

Group members: Jiaqi Yao, Rumei Mai, Xiangyue Meng, Yuting Cui

Breakdown:

Jiaqi Yao: Scene settings, sound setting, light setting for three levels, bullet script, four patterns of monster movement, blood function, character movement script, character attacking script, final merging.

Rumei Mai: Maze scene-setting, character movement function, monster move path code in maze, cross room function between the maze and different levels, camera movement settings.

Xiangyue Meng: Room design in three levels, game light setting, monster movement code in the first level, change scene, game score result script 

Yuting Cui: Logo design, graphic design, UI design, sound collection and script, scene transition script and animation, scenes design: Start, Intro, and Score, final checking and fixing.

Sound References:

BGM:

  • On the Run (Robert Parker)： https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=BOVb1cZoV78 （used in the FIRST ROOM）
  • Electric Girl (she): https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6odDOOyUawY (used in the START PAGE)

  • 真 赛博朋克电子音乐（DISTURVOIG): https://music.163.com/#/song?id=1439432246 (used in MAZE and INTRO)
